FastAPIUvicornServer

{% raw %} 
import time
import subprocess

from pathlib import Path

from will_it_saturate.servers import BaseServer
from will_it_saturate.registry import register_model
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class FastAPIUvicornServer[source]

FastAPIUvicornServer(protocol:str='http', name:str='fastAPI/uvicorn', host:str='localhost', port:int=8000, view:str='') :: BaseServer

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Usage

{% raw %} 
# server = FastAPIUvicornServer()
# server.start()
# print(server.get_pid())
# server.stop()
# print("stopped..")
# print(server.get_pid())
# print(server.started)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
server = FastAPIUvicornServer()
print(server.get_pid())

None
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
server.start()

INFO:     Started server process [25235]
INFO:     Waiting for application startup.
INFO:     Application startup complete.
INFO:     Uvicorn running on http://localhost:8000 (Press CTRL+C to quit)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
server.stop()

INFO:     Shutting down
INFO:     Waiting for application shutdown.
INFO:     Application shutdown complete.
INFO:     Finished server process [25235]
{% endraw %}

class DjangoGunicornWSGIServer[source]

server.start_server()
print(server.get_pids())
server.stop()

print(server.started)

class CaddyFileServer[source]

CaddyFileServer(protocol:str='http', name:str='caddy', host:str='localhost', port:int=8000, view:str='') :: BaseServer

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
server = CaddyFileServer(port=5001)
server.start_server()
print(server.get_pids())
server.stop()
print(server.get_pids())
print(server.started)

class NginxFileServer[source]

NginxFileServer(protocol:str='http', name:str='nginx/minimal', host:str='localhost', port:int=8000, view:str='') :: BaseServer

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class NginxSendfileServer[source]

NginxSendfileServer(protocol:str='http', name:str='nginx/sendfile', host:str='localhost', port:int=8000, view:str='') :: NginxFileServer

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
# server = NginxFileServer(port=5001)
server = NginxSendfileServer(port=5001)
server.start_server()
print(server.get_pids())
server.stop()
print(server.get_pids())
print(server.started)

daemon off;
events {}
http {
    server {
        listen 5001;
        sendfile        on;
        sendfile_max_chunk 1m;
        root /Users/jochen/projects/will_it_saturate;
    }
}
